bibl.title: Production and Public Powers in Classical Antiquity
bibl.note: The direct impact of the Late Roman State on the production and distribution of economic goods. Focuses on examples from Egypt.
BAGNALL Roger S., Governmental Roles in the Economy of Late Antiquity.
Elio LO CASCIO and Dominic W. RATHBONE (Edd.), Production and Public Powers in Classical Antiquity = Cambridge Philological Society. Suppl. 26 (Cambridge, 2000) pp. 86-91.
